trans-unit.resname: Good: Why have I had an itchy, dry rash on the insides of my elbows, for the past 3 weeks?

trans-unit.source: 5. Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.
trans-unit.target: 5.只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。

trans-unit.resname: 6. Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.
trans-unit.source: 6. Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.
trans-unit.target: 6.请使用药物的品牌和通用名称，尤其是当您不在美国，或者询问罕见的药物。

trans-unit.resname: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
trans-unit.source: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?

trans-unit.source: 7. Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for YES or NO answers.
trans-unit.target: 7.尽量避免询问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。

trans-unit.resname: 9. The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang
trans-unit.source: 9. The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang
trans-unit.target: 9.越清楚越好。运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。

trans-unit.resname: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?

trans-unit.resname: 10. Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.
trans-unit.source: 10. Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.
trans-unit.target: 10.不要假设个人的历史知识。HealthTap的医生通过不会看到您以前的问题。

trans-unit.resname: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

trans-unit.resname: HealthTap is for informational purposes only. Content on HealthTap (including answers) should not be used for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment, and interactions on HealthTap do not create a doctor-patient relationship. trans-unit.resname: Restate in your answer any pertinent facts from the member's profile, so other readers will understand the basis for your personalized answer.Reiterating relevant profile information helps ensure that your answer is not out of context and is useful for other readers who do not have access to this profile information(e.g., "Women over 40 who takes medicine X should...")Learn more ›
trans-unit.source: Restate in your answer any pertinent facts from the member's profile, so other readers will understand the basis for your personalized answer. Reiterating relevant profile information helps ensure that your answer is not out of context and is useful for other readers who do not have access to this profile information(e.g., "Women over 40 who takes medicine X should...") Learn more ›
trans-unit.target: 重申您的回答中与会员档案相关的事实，这样其他读者可以理解您的个性化回答的基础。 重申相关档案信息以帮助您确保回答没有脱离上下文，而且这对于我们获得档案信息的读者来说很实用。（例如“40以上的服用X药物的女性应该。。。”）Learn more ›

trans-unit.resname: .network_down, .server_down { position:relative; -webkit-border-radius:5px; background:url(imgs/preLogin/landing_bg2.png); background-size:2px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 2px 6px 2px rgba(100, 100, 100, 1); z-index:99; color:#999; text-align:center } .network_down .close, .server_down .close { position:absolute; right: 8px; top:8px; width:25px; } .network_down { padding:30px 20px 20px 20px; } .server_down { padding:20px 20px 70px 20px; } .network_down .heading, .server_down .heading { font: bold 18px/22px "Open Sans"; margin-bottom:8px; } .network_down .details, .server_down .details { font: 12px/16px "Open Sans"; } .network_down .balloon { position:absolute; left: 5px; top:-40px; width:100px; } .server_down .balloon { display:none; } .server_down .clouds { position:absolute; width:80%; bottom:0; left:10%; max-width:388px; } .network_down .clouds { display:none; }

trans-unit.resname: Please sign up for our trusted payments partner, Payoneer, so your monthly HealthTap earnings can be automatically direct deposited to your bank account. HealthTap completes an accounting review in the first few business days of each month before processing a direct deposit of your prior month's earnings (and/or any previously undisbursed balance). HealthTap does not process disbursement requests in the middle of its monthly disbursement cycles. Thank you.
trans-unit.source: Please sign up for our trusted payments partner, Payoneer, so your monthly HealthTap earnings can be automatically direct deposited to your bank account. HealthTap completes an accounting review in the first few business days of each month before processing a direct deposit of your prior month's earnings (and/or any previously undisbursed balance). HealthTap does not process disbursement requests in the middle of its monthly disbursement cycles. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 请和我们信任的支付伙伴Payoneer签约，您在HealthTap上的收入每月会直接打入您的银行账户。在直接存入您优先的月收入（或者未用余额）之前，HealthTap每个月会在月初的几个工作日内完成账户审核。HealthTap在月未用余额周期中间时不会处理未用余额申请。谢谢您！

trans-unit.resname: There was an issue verifying your Payoneer account. Please visit Payoneer'sContact pageto get in touch with Payoneer's customer care team. trans-unit.resname: A HealthScore is the way we measure health engagement. When your HealthTap activity is healthy, it goes up. Oh, did we mention that there are also rewards for maintaining a high HealthScore?
trans-unit.source: A HealthScore is the way we measure health engagement. When your HealthTap activity is healthy, it goes up. Oh, did we mention that there are also rewards for maintaining a high HealthScore?
trans-unit.target: 健康分数是我们测量健康投入的方式。当您在HealthTap上的活动是健康的，得分就会上升。哦对了，我们没有提到保持高的健康分数也有奖励吗？

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINESTo ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 指南 向HealthTap咨询一个优秀的问题，使用这些有帮助的指南

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little.Hide examples
Good:I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good:Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
更多的细节...至少有一点Hide examples
Good: 在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？这可能由什么导致？
不太好： 为什么我有一个皮疹？ 使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.Show examples
Good:What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good:Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
使（您的问题描述）尽可能长这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的回答。Show examples
Good:是什么导致在家里做家务后会后背疼 - 我的背部从来没有受过伤？
不太好： 为什么背疼？ 使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant.Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary:What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
当相关时，包括性别。Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:什么可能导致男人胸部下面一个四分之一大小的肿块？
Sex/Gender not necessary: 在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age.Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers:For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
包括一个适当的年龄Show examples
不同的年龄段有不同的回答： 前两天，我15岁的儿子发烧了，而且走路一瘸一拐的，好像腿受了伤一样。哪些东西可能导致这种情况？
为什么前两天我3岁的孩子发着烧，走路还一瘸一拐，好像腿受了一样呢？ 使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.Show examples
Good:My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good:My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。Show examples
。 Good: 我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺在他这个年龄这个身高体重正常吗？
Not so good: 我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.Show examples
Good:My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good:My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
请使用药物的品牌和通用名称，尤其是当您不在美国，或者询问罕见的药物。Show examples
。 Good: 我5岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺他服用5ml的泰诺（对乙酰氨基酚120mg / 5ml），但还在发烧。体重和年龄这么大的孩子可以服用更大剂量的泰诺吗？
Not so good: 我的儿子5岁，体重55，有一点发烧。已服用过泰诺但还在发烧。泰诺的更多信息

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.Show examples
Good:How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good:Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
尽量避免提问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。Show examples
Good:抗生素如何在年轻的学龄儿童中起作用？
不太好： 抗生素对儿童起作用吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out.Show examples
Good:Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good:Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
尝试留下意见Show examples
Good: 为什么有些人会抵抗疫苗，明明疫苗可以用来预防疾病？
不太好： 那些反疫苗的人是彻底地不懂还是只是拒绝接受？

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.Show examples
Good:I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good:Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
越清楚越好运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。Show examples
好： 我当时正在锻炼手臂，然后感到二头肌处有火烧一样的疼痛。我是肌肉撕裂了吗？
不太好： Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.Show examples
Good:My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good:And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
不要假设个人的历史经历（知识）。HealthTap的医生经常不会看到您以前的问题。Show examples
好： 我两岁的儿子两个月前得了耳管炎，现在还发烧了，右耳会流脓。这正常吗？
不太好： 这种症状已经持续两天，也一直有浓流出来吗？

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).Show examples
Good:I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good:Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
为了保护隐私，请留下您的姓名和他人的姓名（“其他”除已公开谈论某个问题的名人的名字）。Show examples
好：我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。在过去三年里有新的，好的治疗方法面世吗？
不太好： 您好，医生。我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.Show examples
Good:How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good:How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
避免使用太多的缩写，因为可能导致混淆Show examples
Good: 如果您没有来生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？
不太好： 如果您没有正常的生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.Show examples
Good:I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good:Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
用英语询问。这是HealthTap医生的常用语言。Show examples
好： 我上周末修剪了一些树木，我的手臂已经疼了2天。这可能由什么引起？
Not so good: 因为我的胳膊很疼吗？

trans-unit.resname: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.source: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的医者评分，范围从0-100，是能够积极反应您从HealthTap上的同行处得到的认可度。收到同意或者引荐，以及被加入另一个人脉网，是一些能够影响您医者评分的操作。您的医者评分是另一个您可以提高您在HealthTap上声誉的强大特性。

trans-unit.resname: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.
trans-unit.source: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.
trans-unit.target: 您的等级是您在HealthTap上参与度的累积表现。它是通过您参与不容的活动而获得的活动得分来参与讨论的。活动类型有参与不容的活动，例如回答问题，检阅同事的回答，邀请同事加入人脉网，介绍患者给同事等。

trans-unit.resname: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."
trans-unit.source: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."
trans-unit.target: 当您的回答呈现精确和值得信任的信息时，您的回答会被同事认可时，您将收到一个“同意”。这种形式的同行评审对于那些正在转向您以获得最高质量信息的患者建立信任至关重要。提供最新的、简明的回答，并建立自己的人脉网，网中人可以看到您的回答，这些都是获得更多“同意”的好方法。

trans-unit.resname: This, along with personalized thank you notes, is how patients show their gratitude and appreciation for your compassion and expertise.

trans-unit.target: 和专属于您的感谢信一起，这是患者们对您的爱心与专业知识表达谢意与感激的方式。

trans-unit.source: Your answers should inform and educate the user and future readers about the question, not try to diagnose or recommend treatment to any individual! If the user asks for a diagnosis or treatment, offer instead useful information about the topic of the question, and possibly also guidance to the kind of doctor that can help.
trans-unit.target: 关于这个问题，您的回答应该告知并教育用户和未来的读者，尽量不要给任何个人诊断或推荐治疗。如果用户要求诊断或治疗，请提供对于问题有用的信息来代替，并尽可能引荐能提供帮助的合适的医生。

trans-unit.resname:
I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.
trans-unit.source:
I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.
trans-unit.target:
我很高兴和您分享我找到的一个很棒的最新的简单免费的方法来帮助您更健康更快乐地生活。我们要保持联系。很快您就会每周收到来自HealthTap的时事通讯，里面包含很多充满智慧和美丽照片，帮助您保持身心健康的最佳状态。

时事通讯来自我的HealthTap上的在线诊疗页面－您可以在一个免费的网站和手机移动服务中提出健康问题，收到每日健康小贴士，并从全美最优秀的医生写的世界上最值得信赖和有用的健康信息中受益。

trans-unit.resname: Don't see the email? Please check your "spam" folder in case it went there.

谢谢，我们会尽快联系您！

trans-unit.resname: We've received your support request and we'll get back to you as soon as we can to get you started on HealthTap!
trans-unit.source: We've received your support request and we'll get back to you as soon as we can to get you started on HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 我们已经收到您的支持请求，只要您开始使用HealthTap，我们会尽快支持您！

trans-unit.target: 在线医护您的心理健康

trans-unit.resname: HealthTap now offers private, convenient, and effective therapy consults with {psychiatrists_link_tag_start}Psychiatrists{link_tag_end} or {psychologists_link_tag_start}Psychologists{link_tag_end} via live video or chat message!
trans-unit.source: HealthTap now offers private, convenient, and effective therapy consults with {psychiatrists_link_tag_start}Psychiatrists{link_tag_end} or {psychologists_link_tag_start}Psychologists{link_tag_end} via live video or chat message!

trans-unit.resname: There are three ways in which doctors can interact with and learn from the HealthTap Virtual Care Course: Enrichment, CME credit, and certification.
trans-unit.source: There are three ways in which doctors can interact with and learn from the HealthTap Virtual Care Course: Enrichment, CME credit, and certification.
trans-unit.target: 医生有三种方式可以互动学习HealthTap上的在线医护课程：丰富，CEC学分和认证。

trans-unit.resname: The HealthTap Virtual Care Course is open and freely available to doctors all over the world. Anyone interested in learning the very best current practices in the delivery of Virtual Care can view the course for educational enrichment.
trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Virtual Care Course is open and freely available to doctors all over the world. Anyone interested in learning the very best current practices in the delivery of Virtual Care can view the course for educational enrichment.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上的在线医护课程完全开放并免费提供给世界各地的医生。任何有兴趣在在线医护课程演示中学习目前最棒的操作诊疗的人可以观看课程，丰富知识。

trans-unit.resname: Licensed doctors who complete the course are also eligible for Category 1 Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit, provided through the Accreditation Counsel for Continuing Medical Education.
trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors who complete the course are also eligible for Category 1 Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit, provided through the Accreditation Counsel for Continuing Medical Education.
trans-unit.target: 完成课程的执业医师也有资格拿到由认证的继续医学教育委员会提供的1类继续医学教育（CME）学分。

trans-unit.resname: Additionally, in connection with the course,
trans-unit.source: Additionally, in connection with the course,

trans-unit.resname: doctors in good standing may apply for up to three levels of certification:
trans-unit.source: doctors in good standing may apply for up to three levels of certification:
trans-unit.target: 声誉良好的医生可申请高达三个级别的认证证书：

trans-unit.resname: requires completion of the full course and passing a test demonstrating a clear understanding of the best practices of Virtual Care, as presented in detail in the course;
trans-unit.source: requires completion of the full course and passing a test demonstrating a clear understanding of the best practices of Virtual Care, as presented in detail in the course;
trans-unit.target: 需要完成全部课程，并通过考试，显示出对在线医护课程中详细介绍的最佳诊疗有明确的理解；

trans-unit.resname: requires documented completion of the delivery of fifty (50) hours of virtual care to patients.
trans-unit.source: requires documented completion of the delivery of fifty (50) hours of virtual care to patients.
trans-unit.target: 需要对患者进行有记录的五十小时的在线医护。

trans-unit.resname: requires documented completion of the delivery of one hundred (100) hours of virtual care to patients as well as passing a supplemental advanced test demonstrating established expertise in the delivery of Virtual Care.
trans-unit.source: requires documented completion of the delivery of one hundred (100) hours of virtual care to patients as well as passing a supplemental advanced test demonstrating established expertise in the delivery of Virtual Care.
trans-unit.target: 需要对患者进行有记录的一百小时的在线医护，并通过一个补充的高级检验，显示出在在线医护方面建立的专业性。

trans-unit.resname: While doctors are not legally required to be certified in virtual care in order to provide such care, they must be legally licensed to practice medicine
trans-unit.source: While doctors are not legally required to be certified in virtual care in order to provide such care, they must be legally licensed to practice medicine
trans-unit.target: 虽然医生在法律上不需要被认证才能提供在线医护，但他们必须在法律上有行医执业许可

trans-unit.resname: , and their licenses must be in good standing, to receive certification under this program.
trans-unit.source: , and their licenses must be in good standing, to receive certification under this program.
trans-unit.target: 和他们的执业许可必须有良好的声誉，才能在这个项目中获得认证

trans-unit.resname: To set you up for success, we have ashort, interactive tutorial that simulates a consult and takes you through HealthTap's functionality.
trans-unit.source: To set you up for success, we have a short, interactive tutorial that simulates a consult and takes you through HealthTap's functionality.

trans-unit.resname: It's a fun, fast way (only 5-7 min) to get familiar with the platform before you see your first patient!

trans-unit.resname: We know you’re excited to start seeing patients virtually. To get started, simply complete thisbrief and informative practice consultto experience all the amazing functionality. This is a fun and fast way to get familiar with the software before you have a patient on the other side.
trans-unit.source: We know you’re excited to start seeing patients virtually. To get started, simply complete this brief and informative practice consult to experience all the amazing functionality. This is a fun and fast way to get familiar with the software before you have a patient on the other side.

trans-unit.resname: Completing this tutorial is required before you can start getting paid to see patients virtually.

trans-unit.resname:
Terms and Conditions:
HealthTap Prime Free Trial
trans-unit.source:
Terms and Conditions:
HealthTap Prime Free Trial
trans-unit.target:
条款和条件：
HealthTap Prime免费试用

trans-unit.resname:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTapTerms of Useand these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap accountSettings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTapTerms of Usefor the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.source:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.target:
这些条款（“免费试用条款”）管理由HealthTap提供的对新合格的用户的服务（“提供Prime免费试用”），新合格的用户可以通过注册并提交购买新的HealthTap Prime账户（“免费试用期”）支付信息，来访问HealthTap Prime服务。通过提交您的付款细节，您接受Prime免费试用服务和：(i)们按照我们的付款细节条款使用您的付款信息，和(ii)意HealthTap < a href =“/” terms =“_blank”> Terms of Use 和这些免费试用条款。如果您决定在免费试用期时期结束时不想成为一个HealthTap Prime付费用户，依据HealthTap Prime的条款，您必须免费试用期结束前取消订购HealthTap Prime（在您的HealthTap账户的计费设置板块中Settings）订购费不按比例分摊；免费试用期结束后取消订购仍可使用，直到试用期结束，在此期间账户已被注销。您只能使用一次免费试用优惠。HealthTap保留一切在确定提供免费试用服务的个人资格以及在任何时间撤销或修改此Prime免费使用和/或免费试用的条款的绝对酌情决定权。恕不提前通知并不负相关责任。

HealthTap的付款细节条款: 当您注册试用或使用任何我们的高级服务，或通过应用程序进行其他购买时，您的信用卡信息和其他需要用来处理您的付款的财务数据将会被收集并通过第三方支付处理机构的存储，我们也会收集一些有限的信息，例如您的邮政编码和交易历史细节。任何这样的第三方支付处理机构使用您的数据都会受他们的隐私政策限制。这第三方一般为我们提供一些有限的信息（如一个独特的记录，使您能够通过他们所存储的信息进行额外的购买，和您的卡的类型，到期日期，最后四位数字）

了解HealthTap 使用条款 对于定义的“HealthTap”，“HealthTap Prime”，“应用程序”和“高级服务”“新用户”是指新HealthTap Prime客户没有事先在HealthTap Prime注册基础账户、子账户或试用帐户的用户。

请注意，以下处方药目前不能通过HealthTap Prime获得：毒品或美国特殊药品监督管理局控制的药物（一、二、三、四类药物），精神病治疗药物或改变生活方式的药物（如：针对节食或勃起功能障碍的药物），或各州禁止的药物。

trans-unit.resname: Postgraduate Institute for Medicine (PIM) requires instructors, planners, managers and other individuals who are in a position to control the content of this activity to disclose any real or apparent conflict of interest (COI) they may have as related to the content of this activity. PIM is committed to providing its learners with high quality CME activities and related materials that promote improvements or quality in healthcare and not a specific proprietary business interest of a commercial interest.

trans-unit.resname:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.source:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.target:
RateRx对医生和患者来说都是一个新的独立资源，展示药物有效性的评级，该评级成千上万的美国执业医师在覆盖137多个专科的临床诊疗后报告。RateRx代表各专科经验丰富的临床医生在实际具体情况下医护患者后的一手综合评价。与可能会报告在可控状态下的治疗的临床有效性的其他研究不同的是，RateRx呼吁深入、长期、真实的顶级医生的经验，来展示医生了解到的哪些治疗计划对患者有效。

医生被要求对一种治疗一种症状药物的临床疗效进行1到5颗星的评价。 有贡献的医生给他们的使用的药物评分，评分特别被要求基于他们的知识，并被指示只基于临床经验提供意见。我们总结了每一个治疗的综合评分，得出一个总评分来反映医生的共同经验。所有提供评分的医生文件对用户可见，用户可以审查医生的培训和经验细节，包括他们的专科和协会认证证书。

这项研究对所有美国有良好声誉的执业医生开放。 在HealthTap上的所有66000名医生 鼓励HealthTap医学专家网络中的66,000名医生参加。此外，HealthTap邀请扩展网络中超过五百万名美国执业医师参与这项研究。医生能够输入在任何情况下该药物的有效评分，并可以输入和添加没有包含在内的任何新的药物。

RateRx结果根据平均等级从高到低按顺序排列一种适应症的每种治疗方法。当替代疗法的评级之间的差异，在呈现的数据量的基础上，被视为有意义的时候。

为了确保公正的医生评估，医生们在进入自己的评级之前，看不到他们的同事的现有的贡献。建议一旦提交后便不能修改，但是评级提交后，医生还可以看到其他医生的评级并对此作出评价。患者和医生皆可从RateRx评级系统中了解信息。患者受益于这些医生分享的集体智慧，使他们能够看到不同的治疗方法在相同的条件下是如何评价和审查的。医生受益于同事的评级和评论，能够参照有贡献的医生的诊疗档案来体现他们的能力（例如教育和经验、专科培训、多年诊疗、医者评分和他们“专攻”的主题）

评论是可选的，经常被医生用来证明或解释评级，或者分享针对每种适应症该如何用药的细节。评论可读、可审阅，但不能改变评级的数值。评级是基于通用的药物名称，但医生评级特殊药物时是基于品牌名称。每个显示的通用药物名称都有呈现品牌名称。该研究不会让相同药物的不同品牌名称之间的评级有所不同。针对每种症状，他把最常用的药物方法列表评级。但医生们被鼓励给任何症状都增加治疗方法，以确保每种症状都能包含最新疗法。从未出现在标准疗法单中的疗法，只有在医生曾经在此症状下使用过这种疗法，并发现这种疗法对于此症状非常有效的情况下，才能被加入到标准疗法单中。

Okay

trans-unit.resname: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.source: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 我们的使命是延长人类的寿命，通过在任何地方提供即时访问顶级医学专家的途径和他们值得信赖的健康建议，帮助您感受身心愉悦。

trans-unit.resname:
HealthTap has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

Why choose us
With over 2.6 billion answers served from more than 100 specialties, our experts are able to provide the best medical advice for your question. We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform. We closely monitor user feedback to ensure that our doctors are providing the highest possible care.
trans-unit.source:
HealthTap has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

Why choose us
With over 2.6 billion answers served from more than 100 specialties, our experts are able to provide the best medical advice for your question. We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform. We closely monitor user feedback to ensure that our doctors are providing the highest possible care.
trans-unit.target:
HealthTap已经重新发明了世界各地人们照顾身心健康的方式，让各地百万人能够联系到最值得信任的医生，获得健康信息。

为什么选择我们
有100多个专家，超过26亿个的回答，我们的专家能够为您的问题提供最好的医疗建议。我们有最大的医生网络来提供回答，专属于您的意见，并关心任何问题。

关于我们的医生
要成为HealthTap的医学专家网络会员，医生必须由美国委员会认证，通过严格的资格审查程序，并接受过如何使用我们的科技平台给有帮助的建议的培训。我们密切关注用户的反馈，以确保我们的医生提供尽可能好的医护。

trans-unit.target: HealthTap的回答仅供参考。HealthTap上的内容（包括回答）不能用于医疗咨询，诊断或治疗，HealthTap上的互动也不构成医患关系。永远不要因为HealthTap上的任何内容而忽视或者延迟求助专业的、面对面的医嘱。如果您认为可能是紧急的医疗事故，打电话给您的医生或拨打911(在美国)。查看 {link_tag_start}附加信息 ›{link_tag_end}

Do whatever \ you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by \ typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受咨询时，您的患者将有\ 通过视频，语音或文本聊天与您互动的选择。\ 用微笑开始每一次咨询是非常重要的做任何\ 可以让患者感到舒适。立刻诊疗\ 在下面输入关心的聊天消息，然后按Enter键发送。

trans-unit.resname: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that \ patients can share photos, test results, or other \ documents with you.
trans-unit.source: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that \ patients can share photos, test results, or other \ documents with you.
trans-unit.target: 关于在线咨询一个令人兴奋的事情是\ 患者可以<b>分享照片，检验结果或其他\ 文件</ b>。

trans-unit.resname: Click on the image to enlarge.
trans-unit.source: Click on the image to enlarge.

trans-unit.resname: And communication is a two-way street! During your consult, \ you can attach files (like pamphlets or educational materials)\ to help your patient understand your comments or advice.
trans-unit.source: And communication is a two-way street! During your consult, \ you can attach files (like pamphlets or educational materials)\ to help your patient understand your comments or advice.
trans-unit.target: 和沟通是双向的！在您咨询时， 您可以<b>附加档案（如小册子或教育资料）</ b> 以帮助您的患者了解您的意见或建议。

trans-unit.resname: Click on the paper clip to attach a file.
trans-unit.source: Click on the paper clip to attach a file.

trans-unit.resname: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video \ consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.source: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video \ consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: 除了文本咨询，患者可以选择视频\ 咨询。接下来，我们将检查您的视频是否正常工作。

trans-unit.resname: We are now initializing our video plugin.
trans-unit.source: We are now initializing our video plugin.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在正在初始化我们的视频插件。

trans-unit.resname: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you \ can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient \ has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.source: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you \ can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient \ has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！<b>患者图表</ b>会对您非常有帮助，因为您\ 可以看到您患者的病史，阅读问题患者\ 已询问，并查看其他HealthTap医生的咨询笔记。

trans-unit.resname: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. \ When ready, press the continue button.

trans-unit.target: 单击下面不同的部分以浏览患者图表。\ 当准备好，请点击继续按钮

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from \ the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by \ explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from \ the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by \ explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：当您的视线从相机移到读写笔记时都要向患者解释。让他们感到舒适的\ 解释这是正常和预料之中的。

trans-unit.resname: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient \ who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not \ to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice \ and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.source: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient \ who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not \ to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice \ and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.target: <b>咨询介绍</ b>是对未来患者的首次访问\ 还没有被接受到您的诊疗。即使您选择不\ 接受患者进行诊疗，您仍然可以提供咨询\ 并在介绍性咨询期间建议适当的后续医护。

trans-unit.resname: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the \ continue button.
trans-unit.source: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the \ continue button.
trans-unit.target: 为患者输入介绍性咨询注释。当准备好， 请点击继续按钮

trans-unit.resname: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark \ below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient \ into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your \ reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.source: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark \ below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient \ into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your \ reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.target: 在介绍咨询期间的任何时间，您可以选择复选标记\ 以下介绍咨询注意事项部分<b>接受患者</ b> 进入您的在线诊疗。这是一个很好的方式来扩展您的\ 达到和增长您的诊疗！

trans-unit.resname: Press the checkmark icon to accept the patient.
trans-unit.source: Press the checkmark icon to accept the patient.
trans-unit.target: 按复选标记图标以接受患者。

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note \ displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit \ your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's \ take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note \ displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit \ your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's \ take a tour through each of the sections.

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note \ displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, \ you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To \ help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each \ of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note \ displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, \ you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To \ help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each \ of the sections.

trans-unit.resname: Please click continue to move forward.
trans-unit.source: Please click continue to move forward.

trans-unit.resname: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, \ and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about \ the visit.
trans-unit.source: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, \ and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about \ the visit.
trans-unit.target: 坚持努力！您已经完成一半以上了。<b>主观，客观， 和评估</ b>部分，您可以在其中自由输入文本\ 访问。

trans-unit.resname: Try filling these out. Click continue when you're ready.
trans-unit.source: Try filling these out. Click continue when you're ready.
trans-unit.target: 尝试填写这些。准备好后，请点击“继续”。

trans-unit.resname: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your \ patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.source: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your \ patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.target: <b>计划</ b>部分有几个结构化元素，可帮助您的\ 患者遵循您的建议。

trans-unit.resname: Click continue to go through each one.
trans-unit.source: Click continue to go through each one.

trans-unit.resname: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that \ you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up \ care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can \ also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just \ a few clicks.
